issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
A dialog stating "email not available" is presented on both phones (Nexus S, Droid 3) tested using KS Base UI > Views > Email Dialog. Gmail accounts were set up on each device using test account, and verified functional. Both tabs worked with this same test. Droid 3 now functions correctly with no change in setup. So this is limited to the Nexus S

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI > Views > Email Dialog
3) Select photo from gallery to email

Result:
Dialog "ERROR: Email not available

Expected:
Email composed is presented for sending
fields.summary: Android: Email: v8/Rhino: "email unavailable" on Nexus S phone, works fine on tablets and Droid 3
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.1.v20111108105548, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201111061615, Nexus S (2.3.6), Droid 3, v8 compiler & Rhino compiler
